address2: No. 398 Jiangbin Middle Avenue Taijiang District
longBusinessSummary: Industrial Bank Co., Ltd. provides banking services in the People's Republic of China. It offers personal deposits and loans; corporate deposits and financing; investment financing, such as wealth management, bonds, and deposit certification; and debit and credit cards; specialized financial products. The company also provides internet, telephone, and mobile banking; trust; self service banking; SMS; agency trust; safety deposit box; and consulting services. In addition, it offers cash management comprising capital pool, bill custody, trading platform, internet finance, deposit products, and agency wealth management services; investment banking services, including bond underwriting, loan syndication, financial consulting, asset securization, and other investment products; and trade finance and supply chain financing. Further, the company provides environmental finance comprising fixed asset, current capital, consignment, and merger and acquisition loans; project, equity, and order financing; buyer credit; financial leasing; debt financing tools; and EPC pledged, contract environmental service based, carbon assets pledge based, energy conservation and emission reduction, and structured financing products, as well as special assets management products. Additionally, it offers consecutive, trading, equipment mortgage, enhancement, and circulation loans, as well as IB guarantee-assistant fund financing; joint loan and joint guarantees; agent, cash management, capital custody, and public service products; industrial finance; settlement; asset custody; and insurance products. Industrial Bank Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Fuzhou, the People's Republic of China.
